com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.map.archive

Class MapResourcePackClientArchive

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.map.archive.MapResourcePackClientArchive
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapResourcePackArchive

    public class MapResourcePackClientArchive
extends java.lang.Object
implements MapResourcePackArchive
    Retrieves assets from the stock Minecraft client jar. This archive will automatically download the correct client jar from Mojang's servers before use.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MapResourcePackClientArchive() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void load(boolean lazy)
      If not already installed, calling this method will automatically download the appropriate Vanilla Minecraft Client jar from the official servers and install them so textures and models can be loaded from them.

      The Minecraft client resources are owned by Mojang.
      java.io.InputStream openFileStream(java.lang.String path)
      Attempts to find and open an input stream for a file inside the archive

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • MapResourcePackClientArchive

        public MapResourcePackClientArchive()

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public void load(boolean lazy)
        If not already installed, calling this method will automatically download the appropriate Vanilla Minecraft Client jar from the official servers and install them so textures and models can be loaded from them.

        The Minecraft client resources are owned by Mojang. These assets are installed separately from BKCommonLib. BKCommonLib, nor its developers, distribute (illegal) copies of the Minecraft client. We assume you have already accepted the Minecraft EULA to run the server. If you have not, please read https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula.
        Specified by:
        load in interface MapResourcePackArchive
        Parameters:
        lazy - whether this is a lazy-load call. Allows logging of warnings if it can take a while.

      • openFileStream

        public java.io.InputStream openFileStream(java.lang.String path)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: MapResourcePackArchive
        Attempts to find and open an input stream for a file inside the archive
        Specified by:
        openFileStream in interface MapResourcePackArchive
        Parameters:
        path - of the file (relative)
        Returns:
        input stream of the file, null if not found
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when an error occurs trying to access the file
